title: The first sermon of Noahs drunkennes A glasse wherein all drunkards may behold their beastliness. Noah also began to be an husbandman and planted a vineyard, and he dranke of the wine and was drunken, and was vncouered in the middest of his tent. Gen. 9.20. Henry Smith.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: By [E. Allde? for] William Kearney dwelling within Creeple-gate,
